General.Name: Bekasi Asri Pemula Tbk
General.Description: PT Bekasi Asri Pemula Tbk engages in the real estate development business in Indonesia. It also manages housing projects located in West Java; and sells land lots and houses. PT Bekasi Asri Pemula Tbk was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.
General.Address: Tomang Tol Building, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia, 11470
